sentences.sContent: There were a couple of attempts to usurp the young king.
sentences.sCn: 屡次有人企图篡夺那位年轻国王的王位。

remMethod.val: us (看作use， 利用) + urp (看作up， 上去) → 用 (阴谋) 上台 → 篡夺

trans.tranCn: 篡夺； 篡位； 侵占
trans.tranOther: to take someone else’s power, position, job etc when you do not have the right to
